data.prayer: Lord, for the leaders in the state of Valga, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Valga, Estonia
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Spirit, please convict each believer in Valga, Estonia to take up their calling as a priesthood of believers and pray for the 26,686 lost around them.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood

data.prayer: Spirit, make the Word of God a delight to the people of Valga, like it was to David.
data.verse: I delight in your decrees; I will not neglect your Word.

data.prayer: Lord, please give the 1,314 believers in the state of Valga the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that they might know you better.
data.verse: I keep asking that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the glorious Father, may give you the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that you may know him better.

data.prayer: Jesus, remind the disciples in the state of Valga to train each other to obey all that you commanded, and that you will be with them as they do it.
data.verse: and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."

data.prayer: Jesus, please find the broken hearted among the 28,000 souls in Valga and mend their wounds.
data.verse: He heals the brokenhearted and binds up their wounds.

data.section_summary:
the state of Valga, Estonia has a population of 28,000.

We estimate Valga has 1,314 people who might know Jesus, 11,965 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 14,721 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 21 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, like with the Ethiopian Eunuch, set up a meeting today between a faithful believer in Valga, Estonia and a person seeking to understand the truth.
data.verse: The eunuch asked Philip, “Tell me, please, who is the prophet talking about, himself or someone else?” Then Philip began with that very passage of Scripture and told him the good news about Jesus.
